ygData.subject: Re: Silk lined steel helm
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, the silk lined steel helmet is sold by Bom Knitwood, or whatever his name is in the third mill, i.e. the normal tinkering vendor. Look again ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, the silk lined steel helmet is sold by Bom Knitwood, or whatever his
name is
in the third mill, i.e. the normal tinkering vendor. Look again

From: <roche@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 11, 1999 2:06 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Silk lined steel helm


> From: roche@...
>

haven't found it on a vendor within Akanon or Steamfont, and I have no
receipe to create one. I'd guess that a silk headpiece + a steel helm might
create one, not sure.
>
> Hints appreciated. Thnx
